environmental_issues: Reducing carbon footprint as part of ESG initiatives
social_issues: Promoting diversity and inclusion, though employee perception of diversity is average
Named a Champion of Board Diversity with 30% or more women on its board
governance_issues: Violations of reporting, books and records, and internal controls provisions of federal securities laws
